Text.Page:
Scouts have reported something they're calling {@LinkCreature:42#5002#Tragoleth} leading the skeletal soldiers in the western part of the chamber of the dead.

We don't need them to be better organized, so would be up to the task of taking him out?
Well done. It's always a happy task to reward brave deeds, and taking on Tragoleth was certainly that. Take this, and use it well.
The sooner Tragoleth is dead, the sooner those skeletal troops will be leaderless.
